It is a 150-foot structure with a pinnacle of shining steel<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/locations/sunspear/ HBO viewers guide, season 2 map, Sunspear entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the Spear Tower is a massive tower of stone, thrusts up from the surrounding community, stretching one hundred and fifty feet tall, with a spear of gilded steel atop that adds a further thirty feet. Highborn prisoners might be confined in cells at the top of the Spear Tower.
